mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.shebei_name as shebeiName ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.shebei_types as shebeiTypes ,a.shebei_content as shebeiContent ,a.yuanji_content as yuanjiContent ,a.xiaoji_content as xiaojiContent ,a.shenhe_types as shenheTypes ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.shiyanshi_types as shiyanshiTypes
FROM shebei a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.shebei_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shebeiName},'%')
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.shebei_types = #{params.shebeiTypes}
and a.shebei_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.shebeiContent},'%')
and a.yuanji_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuanjiContent},'%')
and a.xiaoji_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaojiContent},'%')
and a.shenhe_types = #{params.shenheTypes}
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.shiyanshi_types = #{params.shiyanshiTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
